items.title: Evercore ISI upgrades this bank stock ahead of a major deal closing later in 2025
items.description: While shares of Capital One Financial have underperformed in recent weeks, it may be poised for gains in the path ahead, according to Evercore ISI.

items.title: Apple gets a price target cut from Morgan Stanley due to Siri update delay, U.S. tariffs
items.description: A couple of recent catalysts could mean less growth for Apple shares in the coming months, according to Morgan Stanley.

items.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
items.description: Uncertainty around tariffs sent stocks on a roller-coaster ride Tuesday, ending in back-to-back losses for the S&P 500. Here's what's on CNBC's radar ...

items.title: All weather stocks: Two more names to ride out this rough market
items.description: We started with the All Weather list because of some troubling signs in the markets and the economy.

items.title: Boost your portfolio returns with stocks that pay special dividends, Morgan Stanley says
items.description: Companies that pay special dividends may see outperformance, the firm found.
